explanation: [0-0] A man in a garden setting holds a water bottle to his mouth with both hands. He wears a black T-shirt, and a house stands in the background.

[0-2] The man takes a sip of water. The frame is divided into upper and lower parts. The upper half shows a man in a black T-shirt sitting at a dining table, looking at a bottle of Coca-Cola. In front of him are several dishes of food, including rice, beans, French fries, sauces, and some fried chicken. The lower half still shows the man in the garden with water in his mouth. The man in the upper half rests his hands on the Coke bottle.
